description:
The Marvel Cinematic Universe is supported by its vast ensemble of superheroes and supervillains. Many of these characters carry the franchise’s ongoing storylines from installment to installment. Sadly, the death of actor Chadwick Boseman left a void regarding his role as Black Panther in the MCU, though now it looks like a recast could be [...]

The post Marvel Reportedly Plans To Recast Black Panther For Upcoming MCU Movies appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: Marvel Reportedly Plans To Recast Black Panther For Upcoming MCU Movies
